Message:
“Witches aren’t the only ones
that can’t do what they want,
you know.

That’s what Mom
always used to say.

We had to live in secrecy,
deep within the mountains,

giving up on having any form
of a life.

I thought I had come to accept it,
but somewhere deep in my heart
I was screaming.

“Am I seriously okay with this?!
God, I’m such a coward!”
